resources.string: Create exposure for your Academic Work all around the world and get noticed and hired by professionals and companies
Get access to study materials and notes for all the subjects for free and upload your own help out other students
No one can achieve anything alone, so team up and collaborate with students and professionals on Independent academic work and projects
See all the educational events happening around you such as meetups, conferences, seminars and admissions
Join variety of study groups where you can interact with other people and facilitate discussions

Instead of your academic work such as assignments, projects, research work and notes going to waste after they have been marked or graded. Upload them on Resercho and get the appreciation that you deserve for your academic work
